General.Name: Indospring Tbk
General.Description: PT Indospring Tbk manufactures and sells leaf and coil springs to the automotive industry. It also offers automotive stabilizer bars. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Gresik, Indonesia. PT Indospring Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indoprima Gemilang.
General.Address: Jl. Mayjend Sungkono No. 10, Gresik, Indonesia, 61123

1.Name: Mr. Bob  Budiono
1.Title: Human Capital Director, Fin. & Accounting Director and Director
